title: The DevOps Handbook
author: Gene Kim, Jez Humble, Patrick Debois, John Willis
review: Essential reading for anyone involved in software delivery. Provides practical guidance on implementing DevOps principles and transforming organizational culture.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
review: Timeless principles for writing maintainable, readable code. Every developer should read this book multiple times throughout their career.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
review: Updated edition of the classic. Excellent advice on becoming a more effective programmer and building better software systems.

title: Accelerate
author: Nicole Forsgren, Jez Humble, Gene Kim
review: Data-driven insights into what makes high-performing technology organizations. Great for understanding DevOps metrics and organizational capabilities.

title: Test Driven Development: By Example
author: Kent Beck
review: Classic introduction to TDD with practical examples. Shows how test-first development can improve code quality and design.
